overview.title: The Largest Sports Timing Company in the World
overview.sub-heading: State of the art timing systems using technology from MyLaps (ChampionChip, ProChip and BibTag) and race|result
overview.content2: We always cater for each of your race age divisions, special categories, overall standings, teams and relays. Style your athletes experience with customized finishing certificates and access to finishline photos
